casebody.data:
Argued and submitted February 18, affirmed March 24, 2010 Margaret EKREN, as Personal Representative for the Estate of Katherine E. Ischer; and John Mayfield, as Personal Representative for the Estate of Baby Ischer, and as Guardian ad litem for Emma Ischer, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. FARMERS INSURANCE COMPANY OF OREGON, Defendant-Respondent.

Multnomah County Circuit Court

080913791; A141141 228 P3d 614 Robert J. Miller, Sr., argued the cause and filed the briefs for appellants. Thomas M. Christ argued the case for respondent. With him on the brief was Cosgrave Vergeer Kester LLP. Before Haselton, Presiding Judge, and Armstrong, Judge, and Duncan, Judge. PER CURIAM

Affirmed. Collins v. Farmers Ins. Co., 312 Or 337, 822 P2d 1146 (1991).
